tool.name: Scanpy FilterCells
tool.description: based on counts and numbers of genes expressed
tool.command: ln -s '${input_obj_file}' input.h5 && PYTHONIOENCODING=utf-8 scanpy-filter-cells #if $gene_name --gene-name '${gene_name}' #end if #if $parameters #for $p in $parameters #set $min = $p.min #set $max = $p.max #if $p.name.startswith('pct_') #set $min = float($min) / 100 #set $max = float($max) / 100 #end if --param 'c:$p.name' $min $max #end for #end if #if $categories #set cats = ' '.join(["--category 'c:{name}' '{negate}{values}'".format(**$c) for $c in $categories]) ${cats} #end if #if $subsets #set subs = ' '.join(["--subset 'c:{name}' '{subset}'".format(**$s) for $s in $subsets]) ${subs} #end if @SAVE_MATRIX_OPTS@ @INPUT_OPTS@ @OUTPUT_OPTS@ @EXPORT_MTX_OPTS@

param.name: gene_name
param.label: Name of the column in `anndata.var` that contains gene name
param.help: Used for flagging mitochondria genes (starting with 'MT-'). Leave empty if gene table already has a boolean column called 'mito' that flags MT genes

repeat.name: parameters
repeat.title: Parameters to select cells to keep

param.name: name
param.label: Name of parameter to filter on
param.option: pct_counts_mito (only usable if MT genes are flagged or has been pre-calculated)

param.name: min
param.label: Min value
param.help: Cells with value below min will be discarded.

param.name: max
param.label: Max value
param.help: Cells with value above max will be discarded.

repeat.name: categories
repeat.title: Categories to select cells to keep (unless negate is checked)

param.name: name
param.label: Name of the categorical variable to filter on

param.name: values
param.label: Comma-separated list of categories
param.help: Cells with these values in this categorical variable will be kept.

param.name: negate
param.label: Apply as negative filter
param.help: If enabled, specified categories will be removed rather than retained.

repeat.name: subsets
repeat.title: Subsets to select cells to keep

param.name: name
param.label: Name of the categorical variable to filter on

param.name: subset
param.label: List of values to keep
param.help: A one-column headerless text file is required

param.name: force_recalc
param.label: Force recalculation of QC vars
param.help: If set, it will recalculate pcts and other existing QC vars, overwriting existing ones.
